verses.esv:
3   Our God is in the heavens;
    he does all that he pleases.
verses.kjv: 3 But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
verses.niv: 3 Our God is in heaven; he does whatever pleases him.

verses.esv: 11 Yours, O LORD, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the victory and the majesty, for all that is in the heavens and in the earth is yours. Yours is the kingdom, O LORD, and you are exalted as head above all. 12 Both riches and honor come from you, and you rule over all. In your hand are power and might, and in your hand it is to make great and to give strength to all.
verses.kjv: 11 Thine, O LORD, is the greatness, and the power, and the glory, and the victory, and the majesty: for all that is in the heaven and in the earth is thine; thine is the kingdom, O LORD, and thou art exalted as head above all. 12 Both riches and honour come of thee, and thou reignest over all; and in thine hand is power and might; and in thine hand it is to make great, and to give strength unto all.
verses.niv: 11 Yours, O LORD, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the majesty and the splendor, for everything in heaven and earth is yours. Yours, O LORD, is the kingdom; you are exalted as head over all. 12 Wealth and honor come from you; you are the ruler of all things. In your hands are strength and power to exalt and give strength to all.

verses.esv:
9   The heart of man plans his way,
    but the LORD establishes his steps.
verses.kjv: 9 A man’s heart deviseth his way: but the LORD directeth his steps.
verses.niv: 9 In his heart a man plans his course, but the LORD determines his steps.

verses.esv:
2   “I know that you can do all things,
    and that no purpose of yours can be thwarted.
verses.kjv: 2 I know that thou canst do every thing, and that no thought can be withholden from thee.
verses.niv: 2 "I know that you can do all things; no plan of yours can be thwarted.

verses.esv:
21   Many are the plans in the mind of a man,
    but it is the purpose of the LORD that will stand.
verses.kjv: 21 There are many devices in a man’s heart; nevertheless the counsel of the LORD, that shall stand.
verses.niv: 21 Many are the plans in a man's heart, but it is the LORD's purpose that prevails.

verses.esv:
35   all the inhabitants of the earth are accounted as nothing,
    and he does according to his will among the host of heaven
    and among the inhabitants of the earth;
  and none can stay his hand
    or say to him, “What have you done?”
verses.kjv: 35 And all the inhabitants of the earth are reputed as nothing: and he doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou?
verses.niv: 35 All the peoples of the earth are regarded as nothing. He does as he pleases with the powers of heaven and the peoples of the earth. No one can hold back his hand or say to him: "What have you done?"

verses.esv:
9     remember the former things of old;
  for I am God, and there is no other;
    I am God, and there is none like me,
10   declaring the end from the beginning
    and from ancient times things not yet done,
  saying, ‘My counsel shall stand,
    and I will accomplish all my purpose,’
verses.kjv: 9 Remember the former things of old: for I am God, and there is none else; I am God, and there is none like me, 10 Declaring the end from the beginning, and from ancient times the things that are not yet done, saying, My counsel shall stand, and I will do all my pleasure:
verses.niv: 9 Remember the former things, those of long ago; I am God, and there is no other; I am God, and there is none like me. 10 I make known the end from the beginning, from ancient times, what is still to come. I say: My purpose will stand, and I will do all that I please.

verses.esv:
6   Whatever the LORD pleases, he does,
    in heaven and on earth,
    in the seas and all deeps.
verses.kjv: 6 Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
verses.niv: 6 The LORD does whatever pleases him, in the heavens and on the earth, in the seas and all their depths.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv:
19   The LORD has established his throne in the heavens,
    and his kingdom rules over all.
verses.kjv: 19 The LORD hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.
verses.niv: 19 The LORD has established his throne in heaven, and his kingdom rules over all.

verses.esv: 11 In him we have obtained an inheritance, having been predestined according to the purpose of him who works all things according to the counsel of his will,
verses.kjv: 11 In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
verses.niv: 11 In him we were also chosen, having been predestined according to the plan of him who works out everything in conformity with the purpose of his will,

verses.esv:
21:1   The king’s heart is a stream of water in the hand of the LORD;
    he turns it wherever he will.
verses.kjv: 1 The king’s heart is in the hand of the LORD, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.
verses.niv: 1 The king's heart is in the hand of the LORD; he directs it like a watercourse wherever he pleases.

verses.esv: 18 So then he has mercy on whomever he wills, and he hardens whomever he wills.
verses.kjv: 18 Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy, and whom he will he hardeneth.
verses.niv: 18 Therefore God has mercy on whom he wants to have mercy, and he hardens whom he wants to harden.

verses.esv:
4   The LORD has made everything for its purpose,
    even the wicked for the day of trouble.
verses.kjv: 4 The LORD hath made all things for himself: yea, even the wicked for the day of evil.
verses.niv: 4 The LORD works out everything for his own ends- even the wicked for a day of disaster.

verses.esv:
33   The lot is cast into the lap,
    but its every decision is from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 33 The lot is cast into the lap; but the whole disposing thereof is of the LORD.
verses.niv: 33 The lot is cast into the lap, but its every decision is from the LORD.

verses.esv: 21 Has the potter no right over the clay, to make out of the same lump one vessel for honorable use and another for dishonorable use?
verses.kjv: 21 Hath not the potter power over the clay, of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour, and another unto dishonour?
verses.niv: 21 Does not the potter have the right to make out of the same lump of clay some pottery for noble purposes and some for common use?

verses.esv:
7   I form light and create darkness;
    I make well-being and create calamity;
    I am the LORD, who does all these things.
verses.kjv: 7 I form the light, and create darkness: I make peace, and create evil: I the LORD do all these things.
verses.niv: 7 I form the light and create darkness, I bring prosperity and create disaster; I, the LORD, do all these things.

verses.esv:
37   Who has spoken and it came to pass,
    unless the Lord has commanded it?
verses.kjv: 37 Who is he that saith, and it cometh to pass, when the Lord commandeth it not?
verses.niv: 37 Who can speak and have it happen if the Lord has not decreed it?

verses.esv: 6 and said, “O LORD, God of our fathers, are you not God in heaven? You rule over all the kingdoms of the nations. In your hand are power and might, so that none is able to withstand you.
verses.kjv: 6 And said, O LORD God of our fathers, art not thou God in heaven? and rulest not thou over all the kingdoms of the heathen? and in thine hand is there not power and might, so that none is able to withstand thee?
verses.niv: 6 and said: "O LORD, God of our fathers, are you not the God who is in heaven? You rule over all the kingdoms of the nations. Power and might are in your hand, and no one can withstand you.

verses.esv: 11 In him we have obtained an inheritance, having been predestined according to the purpose of him who works all things according to the counsel of his will, 12 so that we who were the first to hope in Christ might be to the praise of his glory.
verses.kjv: 11 In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will: 12 That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.
verses.niv: 11 In him we were also chosen, having been predestined according to the plan of him who works out everything in conformity with the purpose of his will, 12 in order that we, who were the first to hope in Christ, might be for the praise of his glory.

verses.esv:
10   declaring the end from the beginning
    and from ancient times things not yet done,
  saying, ‘My counsel shall stand,
    and I will accomplish all my purpose,’
verses.kjv: 10 Declaring the end from the beginning, and from ancient times the things that are not yet done, saying, My counsel shall stand, and I will do all my pleasure:
verses.niv: 10 I make known the end from the beginning, from ancient times, what is still to come. I say: My purpose will stand, and I will do all that I please.

verses.esv: 44 No one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draws him. And I will raise him up on the last day.
verses.kjv: 44 No man can come to me, except the Father which hath sent me draw him: and I will raise him up at the last day.
verses.niv: 44 "No one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draws him, and I will raise him up at the last day.

verses.esv:
39   “‘See now that I, even I, am he,
    and there is no god beside me;
  I kill and I make alive;
    I wound and I heal;
    and there is none that can deliver out of my hand.
verses.kjv: 39 See now that I, even I, am he, and there is no god with me: I kill, and I make alive; I wound, and I heal: neither is there any that can deliver out of my hand.
verses.niv: 39 "See now that I myself am He! There is no god besides me. I put to death and I bring to life, I have wounded and I will heal, and no one can deliver out of my hand.

verses.esv: 15 which he will display at the proper time—he who is the blessed and only Sovereign, the King of kings and Lord of lords,
verses.kjv: 15 Which in his times he shall shew, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;
verses.niv: 15 which God will bring about in his own time--God, the blessed and only Ruler, the King of kings and Lord of lords,

verses.esv: 27 “Behold, I am the LORD, the God of all flesh. Is anything too hard for me?
verses.kjv: 27 Behold, I am the LORD, the God of all flesh: is there any thing too hard for me?
verses.niv: 27 "I am the LORD, the God of all mankind. Is anything too hard for me?
